definitions.definition: Truly vertical , as indicated by a plumb line .
Describing an LBW where the batsman is hit on the pads directly in front of their wicket and should be given out .

main_definition: Truly vertical , as indicated by a plumb line .
secondary_definitions: ( cricket ) Describing an LBW where the batsman is hit on the pads directly in front of their wicket and should be given out .
